unnormalised: Athlete biographies are my favourite! Just finished reading about Milkha Singh, unbelievable dedication. Remember watching "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag" in Delhi University. Inspired me to run 5 km every morning! Next up, maybe P.V. Sindhu? Heard she trains like a beast, achieving so much! I need that kind of motivation, yaar!
